alert.note: Alert for Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 7:32PM EDT until July 24 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mason County in northern Kentucky... Robertson County in northern Kentucky... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 732 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Brooksville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, Aberdeen, Lewisburg, Sardis, Abigail, Murphysville, Mount Gilead, Mays Lick, Rectorville, Peed, Fleming-Mason Airport, Lowell, Orangeburg, Helena and Somo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
